semantiva.data_io package

Submodules

semantiva.data_io.data_io module

class semantiva.data_io.data_io.DataSink

Bases: ABC, Generic[T]

Abstract base class for data sinks within the framework.

A DataSink represents an entity responsible for consuming and storing data provided by other components in the framework.

_send_data()

Abstract method to implement the logic for sending data.

send_data()

Public method to send data by invoking _send_data.

Parameters:

data (T)

input_data_type()

Abstract method to define the type of data consumed.

Return type:

BaseDataType[T]

abstract input_data_type()

Define the type of data consumed by this sink.

Returns:

The data type consumed by the sink.

Return type:

BaseDataType

send_data(data, *args, **kwargs)

Send data by invoking the _send_data method.

Parameters:

  • *args – Positional arguments for data transmission.

  • **kwargs – Keyword arguments for data transmission.

  • data (T)

Returns:

None

class semantiva.data_io.data_io.DataSource

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for data sources within the framework.

A DataSource represents an entity that provides data to be consumed by other components in the framework.

_get_data()

Abstract method to implement the logic for retrieving data.

get_data()

Public method to fetch data by invoking _get_data.

output_data_type()

Abstract method to define the type of data provided.

get_data(*args, **kwargs)

Retrieve data by invoking the _get_data method.

Parameters:

  • *args – Positional arguments for data retrieval.

  • **kwargs – Keyword arguments for data retrieval.

Returns:

The retrieved data.

Return type:

Any

abstract output_data_type()

Define the type of data provided by this source.

Returns:

The data type provided by the source.

Return type:

type

class semantiva.data_io.data_io.PayloadSink

Bases: ABC, Generic[T]

Abstract base class for payload sinks within the framework.

A PayloadSink represents an entity responsible for consuming and storing both data and its associated context provided by other components in the framework.

_send_payload()

Abstract method to implement the logic for consuming data and context.

send_payload()

Public method to consume data and context by invoking _send_payload.

Parameters:

  • data (T)

  • context (ContextType)

abstract input_data_type()

Define the type of data consumed by this sink.

Returns:

The data type consumed by the sink.

Return type:

BaseDataType

send_payload(data, context, *args, **kwargs)

Consume the provided data and context by invoking the _send_payload method.

Parameters:

  • data (BaseDataType) – The data payload to consume.

  • context (ContextType) – The context associated with the data.

  • *args – Additional positional arguments for payload consumption.

  • **kwargs – Additional keyword arguments for payload consumption.

Returns:

None

class semantiva.data_io.data_io.PayloadSource

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for payload sources within the framework.

A PayloadSource provides structured payloads for processing within the framework.

_get_payload()

Abstract method to implement the logic for retrieving payloads.

get_payload()

Public method to fetch payloads by invoking _get_payload.

Return type:

Tuple[BaseDataType, ContextType]

output_data_type()

Abstract method to define the type of payload provided.

Return type:

BaseDataType

get_payload(*args, **kwargs)

Retrieve a payload by invoking the _get_payload method.

Parameters:

  • *args – Positional arguments for payload retrieval.

  • **kwargs – Keyword arguments for payload retrieval.

Returns:

The retrieved payload and its context

Return type:

Tuple[BaseDataType, ContextType]

abstract output_data_type()

Define the type of payload provided by this source.

Returns:

The data type provided by the source.
